data.name: Bulletkour
data.detailed_description:
Bulletkour is a parkour game of which you have never experienced before. Maneuver through dozens of hand-crafted levels as you leave everything you previously knew about parkour behind. Use an arsenal of different guns to propel yourself through an empty abyss while swiftly running across walls. Bulletkour presents you with the most intriguing parkour experience yet.

Features

  • Satisfying and fast-paced parkour gameplay
  • Tons of hand-crafted levels
  • A competitive timer for keeping score
  • Endless mode
  • Hidden secrets
  • And more to come!

data.short_description: Bulletkour is an action-parkour game about using a gun to shoot your way through various obstacles as you try to escape an abyss with virtually nothing except skill.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
